captions.text: It's 12PM on OVEN RADIO with Apink
Today's attendance check will be in accents
Hello everyone, Eun Ji is here!
Yes, today is the highlight corner of OVEN RADIO
Yes, the first question is from...
I'm sure the ID is in caption
If you were a guy, which Apink member would you date?
She's good at cooking and cleaning...
You should get married to her then
Let's play a little game here
You can't use any English words
What happens if you use English words?
Na Eun, can you hand me what's in front of you?
What do you think it is?
Rong Leader gives it a try
We'll answer more questions after commercials
We'd have to go on stage without any music...
We would've failed to make it on charts
So the love for Apink from fans is...
For all seasons, all places, all times!
A group that grows on fans' love
You can feel their love, right?
Then let's start the game from now on
Come on, it's our fan! You should say his or her ID...
Bo Mi falls into her own trap!
If you could act, what role would you like to play?
I want to be a magician
Maybe you'll be casted for a show...
Eun Ji falls into her trap too!
So answer the questions right away, okay?
Ha Young, what made you so tall?
I ate kimchi since the day I was born!
Bo Mi, how long have you been cute?
Eun Ji, how can you sing so well?
What do the members eat to be so beautiful?
What kind of movies do you like?
Where did we have our first showcase?
Eun Ji and Bo Mi compete for the tea!?
What about the puzzle we made...
Ha Young, you better be careful!
Bo Mi, just drink up, it's easier that way!
Look at her, she's mad now
We have a song request left
"I've been wanting to become a singer"
"But I gave up after puberty and throat injuries"
"There are few songs that helped me get through"
Yes, we'll be glad to sing you the song
This is it for Wednesday's OVEN RADIO!
Don't be sad, no no no
You're not alone, no no no
You've always been a bright light for me

title: OVEN RADIO(오븐라디오) Ep.3: Apink(에이핑크) _ LUV(러브) [ENG/JPN/CHN SUB]
